Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Lamech (לֶמֶךְ) descendant of Seth (שֵׁת) ► father of Shem (שֵׁם) Ham (חָם) Japheth (יֶפֶת)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which humans, animals, or plants produce much offspring, ► and so grow in number and strength
= action by which objects enter a certain location or container, or cover a certain surface to the extent that little or no space is left

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= stat in which humans or animals experience fear
= state of lacking inner strength and courage
possibly shortened form of נֶפֶשׁ חַיָּה living creature: = animal; ◄ generic, sometimes referring to all animals, sometimes limited to wild land animals only

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= a general term for animals
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth
= green leaves ◄ of a plant or tree; ► eaten by both animals and humans; ≈ associated with weakness and mortality
= any of various plants, herbs, grasses, seed bearing vegetation that can be consumed by human and/or animal

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= process by which humans become intoxicated ◄ as a result of having too much alcohol
= action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

= pertaining to a movement in a direction away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which humans are relatively young, ≈ which is associated with being insignificant, but also with being healthy

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so
= man; ◄ youngest son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) ► regarded as ancestor of the Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי)

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= man; ◄ son of Noah (נֹחַ)
= man; ◄ youngest son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) ► regarded as ancestor of the Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= causative action by which deities enlarge the space or territory allotted to humans
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= man; ◄ one of the three sons of Noah (נֹחַ) ► regarded as ancestor of various nations
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
= man; ◄ son of Noah (נֹחַ)
= man; ◄ youngest son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) ► regarded as ancestor of the Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= man; ◄ son of Lamech (לֶמֶךְ) descendant of Seth (שֵׁת) ► father of Shem (שֵׁם) Ham (חָם) Japheth (יֶפֶת)
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= overflow of a large amount of water over dry land
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= man; ◄ son of Lamech (לֶמֶךְ) descendant of Seth (שֵׁת) ► father of Shem (שֵׁם) Ham (חָם) Japheth (יֶפֶת)
= state in which a countable entity is nine in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
